features: REPARATIVE CONDITIONER: Dove Ultra Care Intensive Repair Conditioner nourishes to restore the appearance of damaged hair. With every wash, your hair is left nourished and damage is visibly repaired
FOR DAMAGED HAIR: This nourishing conditioner for damaged hair visibly repairs different degrees of damage and stops 98% of future hair damage.* *due to breakage vs. non-conditioning shampoo
WITH BIO-RESTORE COMPLEX: This strengthening conditioner is formulated with our Bio-Restore complex for complete care that works in harmony with your hair
HOW TO USE: After shampooing, apply this hair repair conditioner to wet hair and massage, leave on for 1 minute and rinse. For best results, use with Dove Ultra Care Intensive Repair Shampoo
INTENSIVE REPAIR: Dove Intensive Repair is a reparative shampoo and conditioner system that targets and visibly repairs damage to regenerate the healthy look and feel of hair
THOUGHTFULLY MADE: This damage repair conditioner is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA and is made in 100% recycled plastic bottles, so you can feel good about switching to Dove
body.description: Dove Ultra Care Intensive Repair Conditioner nourishes to restore and repair the appearance of damaged hair. This nourishing conditioner for damaged hair visibly repairs different degrees of damage and stops 98% of future hair damage.* *due to breakage vs. non-conditioning shampoo. This strengthening conditioner is formulated with our Bio-Restore complex for complete care that works in harmony with your hair. With every wash, your hair is left nourished and damage is visibly repaired. How to use: After shampooing, apply this hair repair conditioner to wet hair and massage, leave on for 1 minute and rinse. For best results, use with Dove Ultra Care Intensive Repair Shampoo. Suitable for daily use. This damage repair conditioner is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA and is made in 100% recycled plastic bottles, so you can feel good about switching to Dove. This hair care product is the perfect addition to your Cruelty-Free beauty collection. Dove Intensive Repair is a reparative shampoo and conditioner system that targets and visibly repairs damage to regenerate the healthy look and feel of hair. This hair care system is ideal for damaged hair that needs extra care, as it revives hair to leave it beautiful and nourished from root to tip. Dove care goes further than hair care with PETA Cruelty-Free certification and 100% recycled plastic bottles. At Dove, our vision is of a world where beauty is a source of confidence, and not anxiety. So, we are on a mission to help the next generation of women develop a positive relationship with the way they look—reaching over ¼ of a billion young people with self-esteem education by 2030.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Formulated with Bio-Restore Complex, Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner restores the appearance of damage on the surface of your hair. The Dove Intensive Repair System continues to improve the condition of your hair over time. With every wash, your hair is left nourished and damage is visibly repaired.

Intensive Repair Haircare system visibly repairs different degrees of damage for beautifully nourished hair from root to tip. Bio-Restore Complex Dove Intensive Repair is formulated with Bio-Restore Complex. Complete care that works in harmony with your hair. The Dove Difference Dove has always drawn inspiration from real, diverse women. We celebrate beauty which we define as feeling and looking your best. Real Beauty is Cruelty-Free Dove care goes beyond just your hair. This conditioner is the perfect addition to your Cruelty-Free beauty collection - just check out its PETA-certified logo. Plus, we are now moving all our bottles to 100% recycled plastic.

Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo, 31 oz Dove Daily Moisture Conditioner, 31 oz Dove Coconut & Hydration Conditioner, 31 oz Main Benefit Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo visibly repairs damage to regenrate the healthy look and feel of hair. Dove Daily Moisture Conditioner moisturizes for soft, smooth, and manageable hair. Dove Coconut & Hydration Conditioner locks in moisture and nourishes your hair to leave it soft, smooth, and beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product works for my curly hair
reviews.reviewText: This is the only thing that works in my hair all others cause hair loss or my hair looks awful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hair feels great.
reviews.reviewText: Because of the tv commercials I thought I would give Dove a try. I have very long thick hair and pay a fortune for my hair products. Soi was pleasantly surprised how good my hair looks and feels after using Dove. The price was a treat also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells great rinses out nice and leaves my hair silky smooth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My hair feels great after using.
reviews.reviewText: I used this product to help my hair with tangles and to deeply condition my hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's not magic like I was hoping lol
reviews.reviewText: I got this because people say how moisturizing it is and that it corrects damage, it has not for me. Hair is still dry, which is my fault from highlighting etc, but I was hoping for a little improvement. If you like heavy fragrance, this is for you! Super strong. I mean... Smells pretty, but it's overbearing to me I think because I'm prone to migraines and I have a super sniffer lol
